name: Hierophant Medusa
languages: Common plus any three languages (Abyssal, Celestial, Druidic, or Infernal recommended)

traits.name: Devotion's Call (1/Day)
entries: The medusa can cast the {@spell Resurrection} spell, requiring no material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day)
entries: If the medusa fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The medusa makes one Constrict attack, one Final Blade attack, and one Snake Hair attack. Alternatively, it makes two Wrathful Strike attacks.

actions.name: Constrict
entries: Melee atk +12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 16 (3d6 + 6 damage) bludgeoning damage, and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the {@condition grappled} condition (escape DC 20). Until this grapple ends, the target has the {@condition restrained} condition, and the medusa can't constrict another creature.

actions.name: Final Blade
entries: Melee atk +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d6 + 6 damage) slashing damage plus 21 (6d6 damage) force damage. If the target has at least one head and the medusa rolled a 20 on the attack roll, the target is decapitated and dies if it fails a DC 20 Constitution saving throw and can't survive without that head. A target is immune to this effect if it takes none of the damage, has legendary actions, or is Huge or larger. Such a creature takes an extra 28 (8d6 damage) force damage from the hit.

actions.name: Snake Hair
entries: Melee atk +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (1d10 + 6 damage) piercing damage plus 5 (1d10 damage) poison damage.

actions.name: Wrathful Strike
entries: Ranged Spell atk +12 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. 22 (3d10 + 6 damage) radiant damage, and the target has the {@condition blinded} condition until the end of its next turn.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The medusa moves up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Wrathful Blast (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The medusa makes one Wrathful Strike attack.

legendary.name: Final Slash (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The medusa makes one Final Blade attack with advantage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The medusa casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 20}):
